SEARCH
Package domain

Class Site

java.lang.Object
domain.Site
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject, Serializable
@Entity public class Site extends Object implements Serializable, Subject
Represents a physical site/location containing machines and managed by a responsible user. Implements the Subject interface for observer pattern functionality.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • serialVersionUID

      private static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • observers

      private Set<Observer> observers
      Set of observers that are monitoring changes to this site. Marked as transient as it doesn't need to be persisted.

    • id

      private int id
      Unique identifier for the site. Automatically generated by the database.

    • siteName

      private String siteName
      The name of the site. Cannot be null or empty.

    • verantwoordelijke

      private User verantwoordelijke
      The user responsible for this site. Maintains a many-to-one relationship with User entity. Cascade persist is enabled for this relationship.

    • address

      private Address address
      The physical address of this site. Maintains a many-to-one relationship with Address entity. Cascade persist is enabled for this relationship.

    • machines

      private Set<Machine> machines
      Set of machines located at this site. Maintains a one-to-many bidirectional relationship with Machine entity. Uses eager fetching to load machines when the site is loaded.

    • status

      private Status status
      Current status of the site. Persisted as a string in the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Site

      private Site(Site.Builder builder)
      Constructs a new Site with all fields including ID (typically used when reconstructing existing entities).
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the site
      siteName - the name of the site (cannot be empty)
      verantwoordelijke - the responsible user for this site (cannot be null)
      status - the current status of the site (cannot be null)
      address - the physical address of the site (cannot be null)

  • Method Details

    • setSiteName

      public void setSiteName(String siteName) throws InvalidInputException
      Sets the name of the site and notifies observers of the change.
      Parameters:
      siteName - the new name for the site (will be trimmed)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if siteName is null or empty

    • setVerantwoordelijke

      public void setVerantwoordelijke(User verantwoordelijke)
      Sets the responsible user for this site and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      verantwoordelijke - the new responsible user (cannot be null)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if verantwoordelijke is null

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(Status status)
      Sets the status of the site and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      status - the new status for the site (cannot be null)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if status is null

    • getMachines

      public Set<Machine> getMachines()

    • addMachine

      public void addMachine(Machine machine)
      Adds a machine to this site and ensures bidirectional relationship is maintained.
      Parameters:
      machine - the machine to add to this site
